remarks: The lower bound of an open interval is a limit point of the interval, wirth respect to the standard topology on complex numbers.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
lptioo1cn.1 $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
lptioo1cn.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR* ) $.
lptioo1cn.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
lptioo1cn.4 $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
lptioo1cn $p |- ( ph -> A e. ( ( limPt ` J ) ` ( A (,) B ) ) ) $.
